summary: Adds a trapdoor to a room with virtually every item in the vanilla game.
descriptionHtml:
Have an idea for this mod? Sent me a personal message!
You will be credited if I implement your idea.

This mod adds a Trapdoor in the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood, that takes you to the QASMOKE developer test room. It also allows you to leave the QASMOKE developer test room. Normally you would have to use the COC console command to both get in and out of this room. 

This room can make a handy player home, as it has all of the needed crafting facilities. But the real reason for this room is becasue it hold virtually every item in the vanilla game!

INSTALLATION:
Download the file
Extract the QASMOKE.esp file from the file you downloaded[Using 7zip or other likewise program]
Place the QASMOKE.esp into your /Skyrim/Data/ folder with the other .esp files

UNINSTALLING:
Delete the QASMOKE.esp from your /Skyrim/Data/ folder

Currently working on:
Making the room more hospitable, Including but not limited to
 - Natural light instead of just [ohmygoditsmagicallythere] light
 - Chairs/Bed/Storage containers
 - Possible quest to get the keys

Future Ideas:
 - New, Outdoor and easily accessable entrance.
 - Map marker to take you to your new home. 

Change Log:
V0.03a
Removed quite a number of items from the Enchanted Weapons and Enchanted Armor Chests, Making them usable~! 

!!!!!WARNING(For .03 and lower): DO NOT OPEN THE \"All Enchanted Weapon/Armor\" BOXES UNLESS YOU HAVE 2-10 MINS TO WAIT FOR THEM TO LOAD, TAKING THE ITEMS TAKES EVEN LONGER!
V0.03
 - More Lighting
 - Locked chests, Key is on the table, For now!

V0.02 
 - Changed name of the Mod
 - Moves Entrance/Exit in the Developer Test Area
 - Added lighting for the Forge area

V0.01
 - Original File
author: Dablackdrood
